Greetings to King of Bahrain
articles.content:
Greetings to King of Bahrain
    Pyongyang, December 15 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, President of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, sent a message of greetings to King Sheikh Hamad Bin Isa al-Khalifa on the occasion of the 41st anniversary of the National Day of the Kingdom of Bahrain on Dec. 15.
 The president in the message wished the king good health and happiness and the people of Bahrain greater progress and prosperity.

articles.title: Congratulatory message to ANCSA
articles.content:
Congratulatory message to ANCSA
    Pyongyang, December 15 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea sent a congratulatory message to the 51st National Meeting of the African National Congress of South Africa (ANCSA) on Dec. 15.
 The message expressed belief that the national meeting would serve as an important occasion in activities of the congress to realize the national unity and the country's development and improve the people's living standard.    
 Expressing the conviction that the friendly and cooperative relations between the WPK and the ANCSA would further develop in the idea of independence, peace and friendship in the future, it sincerely wished great success to the meeting.

Cambodian minister here
articles.content:
Cambodian minister here
    Pyongyang, December 14 (KCNA) -- Hor Nam Hong, Minister of State and Minister of Foreign Affairs and Cooperation of the Cambodian Government, and his party arrived in Pyongyang on Dec. 14.
 They were met at the airport by vice-minister of foreign affairs Kim Yong Il, officials concerned and Cambodian Ambassador here Oum Mannorine.

articles.title: North side's delegation back from S. Korea
articles.content:
North side's delegation back from S. Korea
    Pyongyang, December 14 (KCNA) -- The north side's delegation came back here today after attending the first round of the meeting of the law-making panel for north-south economic cooperation in Seoul.
 It was met at the airport by Pak Chang Ryon, first vice-chairman of the State Planning Commission and the north side's chairman of the North-South Committee for the Promotion of Economic Cooperation, Jong Un Op, chairman of the National Economic Cooperation Federation, and other officials concerned.

articles.title: Paek Nam Sun meets Cambodian guests
articles.content:
Paek Nam Sun meets Cambodian guests
    Pyongyang, December 14 (KCNA) -- Paek Nam Sun, Foreign Minister of the DPRK, met with Hor Nam Hong, Minister of Foreign Affairs and Cooperation of Cambodia, and his party who paid courtesy call on him on Dec. 14.
 Present there were officials concerned and the Cambodian Ambassador to the DPRK.
